Module birch¶

Functions for equation of state fitting.

class pylastic.tools.birch.EOS(V0, E0)¶
Variables:
  • E0 (list) – Groundstate energy to corresponding volumes.
  • V0 (list) – Volume points.
  • par (list) – Fitting parameters.
  • pcov (list) – Standard deviation of fitting parameters.
  • gamma_LT (float) – Low temperature Gruneisen parameter.
  • gamma_HT (float) – Low temperature Gruneisen parameter.
  • B0 (float) – Zero pressure bulk modulus.
fbirch(V, v0, b0, db0, emin)¶

Birch Murnaghan equation of state

Parameters:
  • V (float) – Volume \(V\)
  • v0 (float) – Equilibrium volume \(V_0\) (fitting parameter).
  • b0 (float) – Zero pressure bulk modulus \(B_0\) (fitting parameter).
  • db0 (float) – Pressure derivative of the bulk modulus at zero pressure \(B_0'\) (fitting parameter).
  • emin (float) – Energy minimum \(E_0\) (fitting parameter).
Returns:

Energy at volume \(V\).
Return type:

float
\[E(V) = E_0+\frac{9 V_0 B_0}{16}\left\lbrace \left[\left( \frac{V_0}{V} \right)^\frac{2}{3}-1\right]^3 B_0' + \left[\left( \frac{V_0}{V} \right)^\frac{2}{3}-1\right]^2 \left[6-4\left( \frac{V_0}{V} \right)^\frac{2}{3}\right] \right\rbrace\]
fvinet(V, v0, b0, db0, emin)¶

Vinet equation of state

Parameters:
  • V (float) – Volume \(V\)
  • v0 (float) – Equilibrium volume \(V_0\) (fitting parameter).
  • b0 (float) – Zero pressure bulk modulus \(B_0\) (fitting parameter).
  • db0 (float) – Pressure derivative of the bulk modulus at zero pressure \(B_0'\) (fitting parameter).
  • emin (float) – Energy minimum \(E_0\) (fitting parameter).
Returns:

Energy at volume \(V\).
Return type:

float
\[b = \frac{3}{2}\left( B_0' - 1 \right) \, v = \left( \frac{V_0}{V} \right)^\frac{1}{3}\]
\[E(V) = E_0+\frac{9 V_0 B_0}{b^2}\left\lbrace 1+\left[ b \left( 1-v \right) -1 \right] e^{b \left( 1-v \right)} \right\rbrace\]
